loginInfo: Log in to make the booking.

notification.reservationAlertTitle: The name of the booking may be visible on the display.
notification.reservationApplicationAlertTitle: The name of the booking may be visible on the display.
notification.reservationAlertBody: Do not fill in personal or sensitive information in this field.

label.name: Name of the booking (public)
label.termsGeneral: I have read and I accept the terms and conditions of booking premises and equipment from the City of Helsinki.
label.termsGeneralSpecific: I have read and I accept the item-specific terms of contract and terms and conditions of booking premises and equipment from the City of Helsinki.
label.termsCancellation: I have read and I accept the cancellation terms
label.termsPayment: I have read and I accept the payment terms
label.termsCancellationPayment: I have read and I accept the terms of payment and cancellation

heading.generalTerms: The terms and conditions of booking premises and equipment from the City of Helsinki

errors.bufferCollision: The booking is too close to the previous or next booking. Please change the booking time.
errors.collision: The item is already booked at the time you selected. Please change the booking time.
errors.unavailable: The item cannot be booked at the selected time. Please change the booking time.
errors.termsNotAccepted: You must agree to the terms and conditions of contract before continuing.

reservingStartsAt: The item will be available from {{date}}.
reservationQuota_one: You have {{count}}/{{total}} booking for this item.
reservationQuota_other: You have {{count}}/{{total}} bookings for this item.
reservationQuotaFullLabel: You have reached the maximum number of bookings.
